Upcoming Events
Upcoming Events
Our Events
Fabrizio is proud to host friends, sommeliers, winemakers, wine importers and wine lovers together for wine dinners, wine tastings, wine experiences and casual bar hangouts. We have something for everyone.
Wine tasting
Discover the world of genuine wines like never before at our monthly Wine Tasting events.
(learn more)
Taste of Italy
A curated regional Italian dinner and great stories to share. Optional wine pairing available.
(learn more)
Wine flight special
Enjoy a 2.5 oz. pour of four wines that have some interesting things in common.
(learn more)
Club special
Exclusive and intimate events for SOSPIRO SIPS wine club members
(learn more)
Wine and cheese experience
Shine in society and boast in being unbeatable on cheese and wine pairings!
(learn more)
The wine challenge
Expand your palate (and have fun!) with the wine tasting challenge
(learn more)
Cheers to a world of wine tailored just for you!
Please check back often for upcoming dates or contact Fabrizio via email at
fabrizio@sospirowinebar.com
August  2025
Upcoming Events
WINE TASTING
We love Piemonte
“Piemonte is a jewel, not just of Italy but of the entire wine world.” Located in northwest
Italy
, the region sits at the foot of the western Alps, lending it two unique key features that influence its climate: the cool mountains and the balmy Mediterranean. These forces contribute wide day-to-night temperature variation, known as
diurnal shifts
. The cold nights, foggy mornings and sunlit days are all ingredients that combine to make world-class bottlings.
Pied-mont. Or Piemonte. Whichever way you say it: hard two-syllable, American-style or with the romantic three syllable lilt of an Italian, the word carries mystical qualities. It conjures visions of fog-shrouded hills, white truffle-sniffing dogs and noble wines. Most wine lovers associate the region with the famous reds of
Barolo
, but as anyone who has visited knows, it’s large, complex and full of surprises.
TBA
An exclusive event with genuine wines, real people, great stories.
TASTE OF ITALY
Liguria
The fragrances of the Mediterranean and simple and genuine foods which come from farmland: a narrow strip of land overlooking the sea, Liguria knows how to deliver a varied and tasty cuisine.
September 15 – 20
Long before the country of Italy was unified the port city of Genova was a leading maritime power, facilitating trade of spices, sugars, and even fish to the region, the rest of Italy, and Switzerland. And while the tables of the city’s wealthy were filled with elaborate and showy dishes, farmers across the rest of the C-shaped region struggled to eat, forced to work a land not conducive for growing any valuable crops or livestock. Ligurian cuisine is quintessential in its “Italian-ness,” a paragon of simplicity and devotion to fresh, high quality ingredients. We can say that “Liguria has proved that it knows how to make something out of nothing…”
The cultivation of grapes is carried out in difficult conditions, especially in the “Cinque Terre” region, so much so that it has been defined as “heroic viticulture”: the vineyards are situated on terracing clinging to the mountains, which together with the colourful towns have modelled the extraordinary landscape of this stretch of Riviera di levante over the centuries.
4-course menu
$95
, wine pairing available

About
The Sospiro Philosophy
About
The Sospiro Philosophy
The Sospiro Philosophy
SOSPIRO aspires to be the place where guests may indulge, connect and experience small joys.
The genuineness of the hospitality and of the food blends with an eclectic selection of low-intervention, organic, biodynamic wines made by small (yet tremendously great!) growers.
GENUINE WINES
that are children of the territory, made by
REAL PEOPLE
to be appreciated by real people. We are incurable dreamers and every day we strive to ensure that quality and passion prevail over brands, superstructures and standardization, trying to provide our guests with enjoyable experiences and
GREAT STORIES
.
Stories of people, places, traditions and cultures that we like to tell and share in a light hearted and passionate way with a
monthly journal.
Inaugural issue

History Of The Name
The history of the name “sospiro” dates back to the sixteenth century, in Rome. The Vatican controlled all the economy at that time, and the taxes on wine brought in a lot of revenue. The restauranteurs in that period, served wine in terracotta or metal containers, often using the container fraudulently, not pouring it up to the right  measure.
To avoid this malpractice, Pope Sixtus V (1521-1590), decided to put an end to containers in which the wine was not visible, and to supply all the taverns with glass containers in such a way that one could  control the exact calibration of the wine that the innkeeper served him. The glass container had to bear the plumbing of the Apostolic Camera, the Ministry of Pontifical finances.
In 1588 the Pope promulgated the order, which obliged  the innkeepers to use the new glass measures, the smallest of which, equivalent to 1/10 of a liter, was
called
SOSPIRO,
or
SOTTOVOCE
(so called because the customer, who was ashamed that he did not have enough money to buy a larger quantity, whispered the order…)

About
Private Events
About
Private Events
WOW!
MAMMA MIA!
Sospiro has been featured in The New York Times… But… what does have Sospiro to do with The New York Times?
At Sospiro, we believe in savoring life’s pleasures. As highlighted in the New York Times article, Sospiro is rooted in relaxed gatherings centered around people.
Our events are centered around good food, fine wine and great conversations.
We take the time to understand your vision and turn it into a reality with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring stress-free planning for any event, whether it’s a birthday celebration, wedding, or special occasion.
Fabrizio extends this passion and offers curated experiences like weddings in Italy’s picturesque vineyards or honeymoons through historic wine regions.
Each event is designed to immerse you in the beauty, culture, and stories of the locals, making every occasion truly special.
you can find the
full article here
At Sospiro, it’s all about real people and great stories.
Consult our brochure for more information on capacity, type of spaces and general event guidelines
brochure PDF
ORGANIZE YOUR EVENT
Sospiro offers a variety of cozy, elegant spaces for large party reservations as well as private
events
.
Leave it with us, and our team will ensure your glasses are filled and guests leave with fond memories of the day.
Our Packages
Choose one of
our much-loved packages
or consider us available to create the best
tailor-made solution
for your event.
All the experiences are available
Monday thru Thursday 12 PM to 11 PM
For weekends reservations please contact us via email at
info@sospirowinebar.com
Please note
: prices do not include 18% service charge and taxes.
